TopicTitle: Do you have a screenshot that makes you laugh every time?

Articles.Content:
Looks like Bill, Bob and Jeb are fighting over the controls again...

![WJIKnLa.png](http://i.imgur.com/WJIKnLa.png)

JR

> 
> Looks like Bill, Bob and Jeb are fighting over the controls again...
> [http://i.imgur.com/WJIKnLa.png](http://i.imgur.com/WJIKnLa.png)
> 
> JR

That's hilarious! XD

Her face is just saying: "What have I done!" 

![YvfvGhz.png](http://i.imgur.com/YvfvGhz.png)

Are we there yet?

![p63CiPd.png](http://i.imgur.com/p63CiPd.png)

> 
> Looks like Bill, Bob and Jeb are fighting over the controls again...

> 
> Faceclipboard:
> [http://i.imgur.com/loStxKK.gif](http://i.imgur.com/loStxKK.gif)

I'm going to use that in the "What made you facepalm" thread, thank you.

> 
> I'm going to use that in the "What made you facepalm" thread, thank you.

Take a look at the latest post there. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> Faceclipboard:
> [http://i.imgur.com/loStxKK.gif](http://i.imgur.com/loStxKK.gif)

This is what he does,when you go to launch a,manned spacecraft and forget the parachute...or even the engines

> 
> Looks like Bill, Bob and Jeb are fighting over the controls again...
> [http://i.imgur.com/WJIKnLa.png](http://i.imgur.com/WJIKnLa.png)
> 
> JR

Reminded me of [this particular KSP scene.](https://youtu.be/hUjGW2htpR4?t=35s)

Now, imagine that inside a command pod.
I'm sorry it's not timed as well as it could be, but I'll try again.
![kQa9RC8.png](http://i.imgur.com/kQa9RC8.png)

Just took 3 screenshots.

>

Jeb is a bit concerned, but still enjoys it.

![bcQechT.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/bcQechT.png?1)

Jeb now declares himself king of the VAB! ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif)

![gmr8LLp.png](http://i.imgur.com/gmr8LLp.png)

I love KSP's sense of humor

(Ps. the word "Baka" means stupid in Japanese)

![t4slE59.png](http://i.imgur.com/t4slE59.png)

The Space Program has been running for 4 minutes, and Jeb has had enough already.
